Title: Ensures continuity of care for cancer patients during insurance contract negotiations
Summary: Ensures continuity of care for cancer patients during insurance contract negotiations by requiring insurance coverage and treatment continue until the conclusion of care.
LawCode: Amd §§3216, 3221 & 4303, Ins L; add §§4406-j & 2404-e, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to ensuring continuity of care for cancer patients during insurance contract negotiations
